components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)imide
sample: 0.045 water mass %;0.0018 halide impurity mass %(chemical reagent treatment;dried by vacuum heating)

ref.full: Aki, S. N. V. K.; Mellein, B. R.; Saurer, E. M.; Brennecke, J. F. (2004) J. Phys. Chem. B 108(52), 20355-20365.
ref.title: High-Pressure Phase Behavior of Carbon Dioxide with Imidazolium-Based Ionic Liquids
